level.text: If an advance payment for travel is not collected by the traveler at his or her official duty station, the payment shall be mailed to the address designated by the traveler on the payment voucher.
The traveler shall ensure that the address indicated on the voucher is correct.
In no case shall a request to use imprest fund monies for advances be honored.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 32 DCR 1337, 1342 (March 8, 1985), as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 33 DCR 7296, 7297 (November 21, 1986).
